languages.text: "Глейто нашел след инъекции и зафиксировал остаточный след яда. Очень слабый, видимо, быстро разлагающийся токсин. Но нос кибермастифа и не такое может учуять".
"Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."
languages.original_text: "Глейто нашел след инъекции и зафиксировал остаточный след яда. Очень слабый, видимо, быстро разлагающийся токсин. Но нос кибермастифа и не такое может учуять".

traits.locale_text: "Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."
"Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."
"Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."

"Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."

languages.text: “格雷托发现了针筒注射的痕迹，还探测到了中毒的迹象。中毒的迹象非常微弱，肯定是某种可以快速分解的毒素。不过，这些蛛丝马迹逃不过生化獒犬的鼻子。”
languages.original_text: "Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."

traits.locale_text: “格雷托发现了针筒注射的痕迹，还探测到了中毒的迹象。中毒的迹象非常微弱，肯定是某种可以快速分解的毒素。不过，这些蛛丝马迹逃不过生化獒犬的鼻子。”

languages.text: «Glaito ha encontrado una marca de inyección y restos de veneno. Son muy tenues, así que la toxina se descompone rápidamente, pero el olfato de un cibermastín está a la altura».
languages.original_text: "Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."

traits.locale_text: «Glaito ha encontrado una marca de inyección y restos de veneno. Son muy tenues, así que la toxina se descompone rápidamente, pero el olfato de un cibermastín está a la altura».

languages.text: « Glaito a détecté une marque d'injection ainsi que la présence d'un poison. Il n'y a déjà plus qu'une trace ténue. Il doit s'agir d'une toxine à la décomposition particulièrement rapide. Mais rien n'échappe à la truffe d'un cyber-mastiff. »
languages.original_text: "Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."

traits.locale_text: « Glaito a détecté une marque d'injection ainsi que la présence d'un poison. Il n'y a déjà plus qu'une trace ténue. Il doit s'agir d'une toxine à la décomposition particulièrement rapide. Mais rien n'échappe à la truffe d'un cyber-mastiff. »

languages.text: 「グライトが注射痕を見つけ、また毒の痕跡も検知しました。ごくわずかな痕跡だが、おそらく急速に分解する毒です。しかし、サイバーマスチフの鼻なら見逃さないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトが注射痕を見つけ、また毒の痕跡も検知しました。ごくわずかな痕跡だが、おそらく急速に分解する毒です。しかし、サイバーマスチフの鼻なら見逃さないでしょう」

languages.text: "Glaito bir enjeksiyon izi buldu, zehir kalıntıları da tespit etti. İzler çok silik, hızla bozulan bir toksin olmalı. Fakat bir siber mastifin burnunun yakalayamayacağı bir şey değil."
languages.original_text: "Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito bir enjeksiyon izi buldu ve zehir kalıntıları da tespit etti. İzler çok silik, hızla bozulan bir toksin olmalı. Fakat bir siber mastifin burnunun yakalayamayacağı bir şey değil."

languages.text: "Glaito hat eine Einstichstelle samt Spuren von Gift registriert. Minimale Spuren – das Toxin baut sich offenbar sehr schnell ab. Aber nicht schnell genug für die Nase eines Cyber-Mastiffs."
languages.original_text: "Glaito has found an injection mark and has also registered traces of poison. Very faint traces — must be a rapidly decaying toxin. But it's nothing a cyber-mastiff's nose can't catch."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito hat eine Einstichstelle samt Spuren von Gift registriert. Minimale Spuren – das Toxin baut sich offenbar sehr schnell ab. Aber nicht schnell genug für die Nase eines Cyber-Mastiffs."
